exercise_intensity: Low: No increase in the heart beat, and no perspiration
Moderate: Increase in the heart beat slightly with some light perspiration

alcohol_consumption_category: Social Drinker (> once a month, < once a week)

tobacco_smoking_status: Lifelong non-smoker (<100 cigarettes smoked in lifetime)

exercise_frequency: Most days but not every day
exercise_intensity: Vigorous: Increase in the heart beat substantially with heavy perspiration
